job_description:
üöÄ We're Hiring: Java Full Stack Developer (Contract)
üìç Location: Farmington Hills, MI (Hybrid)
üïí Type: Contract
Are you a passionate Java Full Stack Developer with Angular ready to grow your skills in both front-end and back-end technologies? Our direct client is looking for a motivated developer to join their team. If you're excited to work with Angular, Java, RESTful APIs, and SQL in a collaborative environment ‚Äî we want to hear from you!

üîπ Key Skills We‚Äôre Looking For:
Angular (latest versions)
TypeScript, HTML5, CSS3
Java / J2EE
RESTful APIs (Jersey)
SQL, PL/SQL
Oracle Database

üîπ Nice-to-Have Skills:
Spring Boot or Node.js
Git, Agile methodologies
CI/CD pipelines, AWS or Azure exposure

üí° About the Role:
As a Java Full Stack Developer, you'll play an integral part in building and maintaining web applications with a strong front-end focus and growing exposure to back-end systems. You'll work alongside experienced developers, designers, and QA teams, gaining valuable enterprise-level experience.
üìß Send your resume to: HPrabha@datamaxis.net
üìû Contact: 571-353-3909 Ext 1015
ai_prompt:
You are a professional job application assistant. Based on the job description and resume provided, generate a concise email.

Please provide:
1. A concise, professional subject line
2. A personalized email body that:
   - Expresses genuine interest in the position
   - Highlights relevant skills and experience from the resume that match the job description
   - Demonstrates knowledge of the role
   - Includes a clear call to action
   - Maintains a professional yet personable tone
3. Body should
Format your response as JSON with two fields: "subject" and "body".

Subject should be
Application for [role name] (Location).

Signature at end of email should be.
Best regards,
Sai Charan Teratipally
tcharan.tech@gmail.com
+1 (940) 277-2434

Please format the email body with proper line breaks:
- One line break after the greeting
- Double line breaks between paragraphs
- One line break before the signature
- Use \n for line breaks
- Make sure to format the body same like below example response but alter according to jd

Example format:
Hello ,\n\n[Paragraph 1]\n\n[Paragraph 2]\n\nBest regards,\n[Your Name]

Example response:

Hello,

I hope you‚Äôre doing well.

Thank you for sharing the details of the Senior Java Microservices Engineer (Cloud-Native | Reactive Systems) position in Sunnyvale, CA. I‚Äôm very interested in this opportunity and believe my experience aligns closely with the role requirements.

I have over 10 years of experience in designing and developing scalable, cloud-native, and microservices-based enterprise applications using Java (8‚Äì17), Spring Boot, and distributed systems architecture. My technical background also includes hands-on expertise with Kubernetes, Docker, GCP, Azure, and messaging frameworks such as Kafka.

Some highlights from my experience include:

- Designing reactive, fault-tolerant microservices using Spring Boot, WebFlux, and Camel.

- Deploying and scaling microservices on Kubernetes and cloud platforms (Azure & GCP).

- Working with Oracle, Cassandra, and Cosmos DB for distributed data processing.

- Implementing CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and Git, ensuring high code quality through JUnit, Mockito, and TDD practices.

- Strong focus on performance tuning, multithreading, and high availability in distributed systems.


Please find my updated resume attached for your review. I would love the opportunity to discuss how my experience aligns with your client‚Äôs needs.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

{Signature}
email_subject: Application for Java Full Stack Developer (Contract) in Farmington Hills, MI
email_body:
Hello,

I hope this email finds you well.

I am writing to express my genuine interest in the Java Full Stack Developer (Contract) position in Farmington Hills, MI. After reviewing the job description, I am excited about the opportunity to contribute my skills and experience to your team.

With a strong background in Angular, Java, RESTful APIs, and SQL, I am confident in my ability to deliver high-quality solutions while collaborating effectively with cross-functional teams. My experience aligns closely with the key skills you are looking for, and I am particularly enthusiastic about the chance to work on both front-end and back-end technologies.

I have attached my resume for your review and would welcome the opportunity to discuss how my background can meet the needs of your client. Please let me know if there is any further information required from my end.

Looking forward to the possibility of contributing to your team.

Best regards,
Sai Charan Teratipally
tcharan.tech@gmail.com
+1 (940) 277-2434

job_description:
Java Full Stack Developer 

Location: Illinois (Remote / Hybrid / Onsite)

Visa Eligibility:
Open to OPT, CPT, H4-EAD, EAD, USC and all other visas, except H1B and Green Card

Job Overview:
We are looking for a skilled Java Full Stack Developer for a client engagement based in Illinois. This opportunity supports remote, hybrid, or onsite work options and is RTR friendly. Candidates with strong full-stack development experience are encouraged to apply.

Required Skills:
Strong experience in Java, Spring Boot, Microservices, REST APIs, Hibernate/JPA, front-end technologies such as Angular or React, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL and NoSQL databases, Git, CI/CD pipelines, and cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP). Prior experience in Agile/Scrum environments is preferred.

Key Responsibilities:
Design, develop, and maintain scalable full-stack applications; build and integrate backend services with front-end components; collaborate with cross-functional teams including QA and DevOps; participate in code reviews; perform unit and integration testing; and support deployments and production issues.

How to Apply:
Qualified candidates may share their updated resume to moni@sparklinksystemsllc.com

job_description:
Hi Everyone, We have job opportunity for Full Stack Java Developer in Remote (only from DMV) with one of our clients. Kindly let me know if you are interested or someone who might be interested, please call me or send an updated resume. I can be reached @703-665 5599 x 811 (or) Email: alekya.boda@talteam.com

Remote - In-person interview will be needed in Reston, VA

Must have
AWS Certified Developer
Certified Kubernetes Administrator (CKA) or CKAD (Certified Kubernetes Application Developer

Pure Full Stack Java Developer role with solid Kubernetes administration and containerization experience.
Full Stack Java development using Spring, Spring boot, microservices and Angular.
Must have solid AWS experience
Must have experience with Docker and Kubernetes.
Must have experience with Angular 16+ and above.
CI/CD ‚Äì DevOps
Some experience with TDD and BDD
Must have solid containerization and Kubernetes experience. This is the KEY.
